scripts.dev: lsof -ti:3001 | xargs kill -9 2>/dev/null; lsof -ti:3000 | xargs kill -9 2>/dev/null; lsof -ti:4000 | xargs kill -9 2>/dev/null; mkdir -p output/api output/web output/admin; npm run dev --workspace=apps/api > output/api/out.log 2>&1 & echo "api pid: $!"; npm run dev --workspace=apps/web > output/web/out.log 2>&1 & echo "web pid: $!"; npm run dev --workspace=apps/admin > output/admin/out.log 2>&1 & echo "admin pid: $!"
scripts.stop: lsof -ti:3001 | xargs kill -9 2>/dev/null; lsof -ti:3000 | xargs kill -9 2>/dev/null; lsof -ti:4000 | xargs kill -9 2>/dev/null; echo "stopped"
